Key Match Events: India equalled Afghanistan's score of 16 in the first super over
India win the match after two superovers
Pre-Game Insights: India predicted to sweep the series
India may make changes in the playing XI
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bangalore
